sentences.sContent: Ron does nothing but criticize and complain all the time.
sentences.sCn: 罗恩什么也不干，只是一味指责和抱怨。

sentences.sContent: The new law has been widely criticized .
sentences.sCn: 这项新法律受到了广泛的批评。

sentences.sContent: We look at each other’s work and criticize it.
sentences.sCn: 我们交换作品，互相提出批评意见。

sentences.sContent: ...we re not trying to assign blame or criticize anyone or call anyone conscious Its of this study to open up meaningful dialogues on implicit gender bias...

words.tran: 鉴定的；[核] 临界的；批评的，爱挑剔的；危险的；决定性的；评论的
精密地；危急地；批评性地；用钻研眼光地
批评家，评论家；爱挑剔的人

trans.tranOther: to express your disapproval of someone or something, or to talk about their faults
